name: Ball Up v0.1
description:
Basic Guide:

Yellow Ball = Score Points.

 Red Ball = Game Over. 

Green Ball = Speed Debuff.

Yellow Ball hit floor -50 points, what did you think it's going to be easy. It's Life nothing easy earn it on your own. As i said before score as high as you can, if you can that is.

--------What to add in the future update

Online Scoreboard

 A story

More Balls

 Hard Mode / Easy Mode
